name: Hooks 'n Portals
description:
This game was developed based  on  the already  designed prototype made by  Daniel-Ilett "portals" and DaniDevy  "Grappling Hooks". The final idea was brought together by  Chilman, Pancatov and Gwiny as a  conclusion for the class:  Física  Para  Jogos Digitais - UNISINOS.
Hooks 'n Portals is a gamed based on the mechanics of parkour in first person, but with the double twist of, well...  Grappling Hooks and Portals, and that's it, pretty simples isn't it? Test the limits of your precision and reflexes in this prototype!
